summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Warkop Mamet food ordering system. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend customer and admin flows working well. Minor WebSocket connectivity issues identified but core functionality intact.

integration_issues.issue: WebSocket connection failing with 'WebSocket is closed before the connection is established'
integration_issues.impact: Orders still work but real-time updates may not function

passed_tests: Backend API authentication (admin login, token verification)
Menu CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete menu items)
Order operations (create order, get order details, update order status)
Add to cart and quantity management
Order status updates via admin interface
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix WebSocket connectivity issues - WebSocket connections are failing which affects real-time order status updates and admin notifications. The error is 'WebSocket is closed before the connection is established'. This may be related to the Socket.IO server configuration or network routing.
